title: Curriculum Development Practical Competency Enhancement: Deaf Patient Medication Education: Microlearning-Based Self-Directed Approach

context.prior_knowledge: Comprehension of core concepts and intermediate-level application skills
context.additional_context: Competency enhancement program for professionals in education/teaching/learning fields

learning_goals: Medication information can be delivered through visual and text-based methods tailored to the health literacy and communication abilities of hearing-impaired patients.
Learners understand core content—such as medication administration methods and side-effect management—with over 80% accuracy using microlearning modules (5-minute videos + quizzes).
Through formative assessments (quizzes, case analyses), learners can propose at least three patient-type-specific customized education strategies.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
